content.detailedDescription: We were sitin by the lake when this big object appered and landed on the otherside of the lake we hid in a bush while a cone headed lookin thing came lookedabout took a plant and then shortly left

I was flying my plane one night it was about 230 a.M. my dog was acting kind ofstrange, he was barking out the window. so i grabbed my bottle of whiskey andthrew it at him it was empty anyways. then i started to feel tingly inside. so ifigured i should land so i could use the restroom. all of a sudden i felt verywarm and off into a distance i saw something strange. i started to get extremelydizzy. then i felt like i was sick i saw ten of those things i wished i hadsomeone with me to experience what i saw. i was completely amazed after it wasover i couldnt believe something like that was going on. it was flaming acrossthe sky then it started shooting out laser beams and started to shoot at me so igot out my other bottle of whiskey out cause i just didnt know what else to do.I asked my injured dog if he had seen it too and he said gimme another drink andmaybe i will. then i woke up in this strange place and after i opened my eyesand i saw the strange place and saw many strange things it looked like aliens.All the while my dog was completely ambiguous to what was going on.
content.summary: The night i saw an extra terrestrial

content.detailedDescription: As veiwing the eclipce with many others between the hours of 930pm and 1200am onthe way home walking along the lake shore path aprox 11pm ish possibly sw cornerof the lake above an island a light was hovering for aprox 5-7mins from timenoticed asked what could be was there a tower with a beacon above answer no.Light began to move then realized was not a beacon was definetly a plane orhelicoptor flying object moving .Thought could be a helicoptor or plane as usualmaybe a air ambulance due to the amount of light from the object,object movedtoward us closer appeared to be a search light emitted on the lake like a searchand rescue possibly then object flew by slowly as though it had to be ahelicoptor object had no sound no wind was no more than 500 feet up the lightswere multicoloured some were lit thenn not there seemed to be something calmingabout the on off blinking patters emitted from lights thought maybe it was a airambulance with all light on and lights inside on aswell object then continued tofly past somewhat slow flew toward the city .Based on direction there is no airstrip in the direction of flight but did seem to fly either into the city orrapidly over ....Object was definetly seen by others on the board walk hadpeople on it cars were driving on roads and there was a large gathering ofpeople at the beach for the public eclipce viewing the sighting of the objecttook place when we left the public viewing at the beach .Note the flight actionof the object were oddly smooth and clean .Strange and weird to see somethingthat might be a helicoptor or plane but reason says that if it was eitherpatterns of flight behaviour lights all seemed unique

I was sitting on my porch and talking on the phone when i saw what i thoughtwere meteors. i began watching more closely and watched as these lights would godiagonal and then go up. some would dance around and on several occasions i sawtwo lights streak and then move up and down towards each other, reversedirection and then go toward the moon. the was very bright as it came up into mysight line and if you looked at the moon it seemed these objects came fromthere. it was almost as if they were flares, but they would change direction andmoved almost constantly. it could be a natural phenomenom, but it was certainlyamazing the speed was remarkable and at the vast far off distance, they had tobe going amazingly fast. could they be meteors breaking streaking down and thenbouncing off the atmosphere whatever it was, it was pretty odd.

Went to bed and inexplicably found myself on the bed of a vehicle truck.  wasthere for about 15-20 minutes while traveling though secondary roads.  meantime,i was trying to figure out what was going on.  after a while 5 minutes  i becamevery desperate and thought i had gone mad.  started praying and assumed that theentities driving had to be ets. finally stopped and 2 beings unloaded me off thetruck, by this time the paralisis was gone and i was able to walk.  went throughan open area and beyond was a round craft, all three of us went in and was gretby an incredibly tall human like being.  friendly and explained that he was notgoing to do me any harm. he stressed that i had agreed to be contacted before iwas borned. indicated that i was to write a book and to disceminate informationthat they were to provide at a later time.  i spent about three hours in theircraft and was exposed to the most amazing realities and different version aboutreligion.  they said the will contact me again.  they did.  since 1993 i havebeen contacted about two dozen times. i wrote a book ufo reality or amanifestation of the subconscious. they have exposed me to the most unbelievablerealities. too abstract, too crazy to expose them anywhere.

I was stolling on the walkway in my front yard enjoying a cup of tea.I thought i saw what looked like a helocopter search light in the se sky behindmy home. it proceded to follow the same path a tornado took one year previous.It came without sound but, the palmeto bugs that were making their eveningsounds that were deafening, all stopped instantly.It was a warm evening withcool breezes, temp around 70 degres and a completely clear night sky, you couldsee every star. our home sat in open fields so, i had a clear view ofeverything. the saucer stayed on path, traveling at about 5 mph. when it wasdirectly overhead i felf completely at peace and my heart felt up-lifted. thesaucer glowed yet the only thing i noticed moving on it was a gold ball withtail circling ever so slowly around its perimeter. i loss sight of the objectwhen it went far enough west to be below the treeline.
content.summary: White glowing saucer following old path of tornado

content.detailedDescription: Dear mr. ,thank you very much for your consideration.Regarding your previous e-mail3eis there any possibility that your brother would like to submit a report, aswell  we would like to include his report in our database.My brother, the black sheep of our family is currently incarcerated, i.E. hes inprison. i will ask him to send me a hand written report detailing hisrecollection of the ufo sighting. upon receipt, i will file his report in yoursystem electronically.3ecould i ask, what submarines did you serve oni served onboard the uss  ssn- a fast attack  class nuclearsubmarine.3ealso, i am intrigued by your interpretation of the events that you witnessedback in 1980.  what is your line of reasoning, please, regarding 1 the3eendothermic reaction, and 1 that it must have involved the combination ofwater and air molecules.  if such combinations were to occur, and it gave3eoff sparks, would that not be an exothermic reactioni apologize for my poor explanation of the chemical reactions, which i reasoned,might have been occurring around the object. i will elaborate.It appeared to me that there was some form of spherically shaped force fieldentirely surrounding the object. imagine two concentric spheres the innersphere, being the glowing object, and the outer sphere two feet larger indiameter defining the surface of an invisible force field surrounding the objectlike one beach ball inside of another larger beach ball. now, i couldnt actuallysee the surface of the force fieldbut i could infer that it was located there, because it was along that invisiblesurface the apparent force field surface upon which the threads which i couldsee were being formed, wiggled around, and moved about.I believed that the sparkling lights floating downward - below the object wereactually the threads breaking down exothermically after they had fallen awayfrom the intense force field, which i assumed had created them. the sparklinglights, if they were indeed the falling threads, indicated an exothermicprocess. in that case, it would have required an endothermic process to createthe threads... i reasoned that the objects force field had literally crushed theair molecules and possibly water vapor molecules as well - due to atmospherichumidity levels around it into a solid compound, which i observed as thethreads. such a chemical reaction would require the input of energy anendothermic process.0
content.summary: Close encounter with a nocturnal light.

content.city: From Hayward, CA to San J
content.detailedDescription: Objects were a pair, flew together a very small distance apart. we were betweenlocations for work and didnt have camera. ill know better now to carry one.Other people had to of seen it. it was broad daylight and the objects didnt seemin a hurry. in fact, they lumbered enough that we took a 10 minute detor from680s to 880s. we followed them from foothill area of fremont area where we firstsaw them and followed through milpitas 880s, and then to northern san jose. wegot stuck in traffic and werent able to go down 101s to continue. we also had toget back to work. i hope other people had cameras or were paying attention. wehave several major airports in the area but these were definately not anythingid seen. they also werent the disk shape objects ive commonly heard of. theywere like flatish triagle but had cut outs, like 3 bites off the flat part, andwere dark grey, no reflection off them. they werent a4s or anything like thatfrom moffettames. they didnt have any lights that i could see and the sky wasclear as a bell. the air was fairly still like what wed call earthquake weatherbut the wind from the incoming fog on the coast caught up when we lost site ofthe two objects. im going to try to call the faa in fremont today to see if theyhave any reports.
content.summary: Daylight sighting in san francisco bay area30 minu
content.locationName: From Hayward, CA to San J, California

content.detailedDescription: I was driving 60-70 mph east on kansas i-70, milleage marker 261, with plenty oftraffic and headlights going both directions.  suddenly i saw 2 lines of objectsahead and roughly 45 degrees from the horizon.  at first i thought i was passingunder power lines with triangles roughly 3-5 lengths apart, each having 3 lightsclose to the vertices.  i think but am not sure that the colors were white,bluish white, and redish white.  after about 3 seconds i realized that whilethey were moving in two lines, somewhat parallel, my car was not passing underthem, so they must be much further away.  they were traveling roughly 285degrees assuming i was headed due east 90 degrees.  the closer string went awayafter about 3 seconds, and the other continued in view for another 10-15seconds.  i suspect the objects were flying in a v formation.  there was nosound and the objects floated, somewhat like ultralight aircraft.  i pulled offthe highway after they went by, and went to the back of the vehicle in order toview them moving off in the distance.  by that time each object looked like adull single light.  though there was the sound of traffic, i think i would haveheard the engines of so many aircraft, particularly since i opened the window asthey went by.  i stopped at the next rest area to write this report.
content.summary: V shaped formation of triangular ufos, each with 3

content.detailedDescription: 1. we were in ft. walton beach, florida on a short weekend vacation. we werelying on the beach at night.2. it streaked across the sky3. a shooting star or meteor4. we were quite bewildered when it began peforming complex maneuvers that ashooting starmeteor or known aircraft could not.  we pointed to it, turned towatch it move when it covered a great distance, and wondered aloud what we wereseeing.5. for the first five sightings, all we could see was a faint red light, whichlooked to be about the size of a big star. during the sixth sighting we saw thesilhouette of a shape in the moonlight. our notes detailing the actions, takenimmediately after the sightingsa. half moon. lying on our backs. big dipper almost directly overhead. moonsouthwest of big dipper. saw it the pale red light go east to west rapidly.Thought it was a shooting star. very faint red hue. no contrail, etc. consideredpossibility it was a satellite.B. approx 10 min later saw light go west-east briefly, then u-turned quickly andwent back west. much faster than a planewed just seen one and could compare. plane left visible vapor trail. disappearedgoing west.C. approx 10-15 minutes later. light appeared below big dipper. zig-zaggednorth, turned around, did s-curves and quickly went west out of sight.D. 10-15 min later. went all over below big dipper. all over the  place. turns,stops, zig-zags, went north, stopped, came back south, stopped, then wentstraight east.E. 15-20 min later. big dipper area again. a little slower. went east to west ina gentle arc, straightened and went west.F. 1130pm - appeared again above us while we were out on hotel balcony. watchedit go east to west, then stop, and go back and forth, making a few turns. we sawshape a little bit clearer, and it definitely has wings, but they dont move nordo they go in same direction as flight. did move around for a minute or two,then disappeared above us, like it went straight up perhaps.6. it finally disappeared above us.

Hi i am a ing. rodolfo flores mejia and living in mexico city i have ainvestigation of new type of air plane this plane is exactly a ufos of thejhonatan reed i have date,plane,models ,all is backing by a one school whit tosignet my email is heflome@hotmail.Com this is urgent
content.summary: I am inventor of ufos of jhonatan reed

content.detailedDescription: When i was 2 to 4 years old 1968 - 1970, my mother wrote down in a journal thati had a pretend friend whose name was arjid, at our residence at 444 locuststreet in greensburg.I dont remember this pretend friend at all. however, i recently looked up theword on the internet. it turned up in one language only, called manx, meaninghighness.I had no idea what manx was or where it was spoken. i did some research andfound out it is an extinct gaelic language once spoken on the isle of mann offthe coast of england.In one of whitley striebers books, transformation, there was a possibleconnection mentioned between the gaelic languages and the visitors.I cant shake the suspicion that maybe i was visited at a very young age ingreensburg.There was one other incident, maybe around 1970 or 1971, where i thought i saw apurplish silhouette of a man or something standing outside my second storywindow. he or it would have been standing on our sun parlor roof. anyway, itscared the shit out of me. but i have always passed that off as a hallucination,or maybe even an after image from rubbing my eyes. it also could have been myolder sister playing a prank on me.
content.summary: Possible contact with visitors as a child

content.detailedDescription: Out for a ride. the ufo slammed down to the ground, right across the road fromthe car. it bounced up high, then it straightened out, like a beautiful whiterug and wrapped itself around the earth. i was very worried because there was aairplane to the right hand side of the road, just passed the electric wires. theufo went in a western direction. 6924 road in deer park township

Entered by craig r. lang - principal investigator on this case.Sighting account:================the witness was driving east on 10th street, which passes along the southboundary of lake elmo park reserve.  while on 10th st., just after having turnedonto it from hwy 19, well prior to reaching the intersection with lake elmo aven., she noticed a bright light directly ahead in the distance (low the easternsky).  she often sees aircraft in this direction and initially felt that the lightmight have been an approaching airplane.  as she watched, she noted that thelight was getting brighter, and at this point she felt that it no longerresembled an aircraft.  at a point about  of the way between hwy 19 and lake elmo ave n. she noted thatthe light was accompanied by a second light.  she theorized that this might be ahelicopter.  she rolled down the drivers side window to listen for any sound,but did not hear anything unusual.She came to a stop at the stop sign at the intersection of 10th st. and lakeelmo ave n.  at this point, she noticed that the light had brightened stillfurther, and now appeared to be more of a chevron shape.  she felt at thispoint, that the object was considerably larger than an aircraft.  she also notedthat it appeared to be descending, and moving to the right. as she accelerated east from the stop sign at the intersection with lake elmoave n. her view of the object was briefly obscured by some trees.  a momentlater, when she had moved past the trees, she observed a large chevron shapedrow of lights (see object description, below) at the tree line, to the right ofthe road.  the object appeared to be atop, or behind, the hill to the south ofthe road, and seemed to be hovering at treetop level.She slowed the car to a speed less than 20 mph (typical speeds on this stretchof road are about 60mph), and rolled down the right window.  she observed thatthe object lit up the tree tops, and appeared to have a length of about sixtree-widths.  she describes feeling a sense that this was not normal, andseemed menacing.  she arrived at the stop sign at the corner of 10th st. and manning ave. andturned left onto manning ave.  she observed in her rear view mirror, that thetrees were lit up, apparently from the object, but was unable to see the objectat that point.She noted that there were several qwest (telephone company) workers at theintersection, apparently working on a telephone utility box at the corner.  sheobserved that they did not seem to notice the nearby lights.Object description (as she observed it just over the tree line):  ==================horizontal/chevron shaped array of six brilliant lights - the length of thelight formation was equivalent to approximately four to six tree-widths. although a structure associated with the lights is implied, she indicates thatshe was not able to discern any platform or structure, and that the lights wereas bright as those of an athletic field.She describes the lights as being extremely bright, lighting up the tree tops. they were white, and did not vary in position, form or intensity.  they appearedto be circular in shape, although the brightness made it difficult to discernactual shape.
I saw it.

We were on a weekend retreat at a home on lake tawakoni which is located about50 miles east of the dallasft.Worth metroplex. it was 300am and there were onlynine of us sill awake outside sitting around the fire talking. none of us drinkor do drugs of any kind. the object was first noticed very high in the sky. itwas moving slowly at first. one of us ran into the house to get the smalltelescope. by the time the telescope was ready the object was a little closerand stationary. i zoomed in on it with the telescope and was amazed at the sightof it. it was round and had a green thin outline of light that appeared to bemoving counter-clockwise. just inside of that there was a white thin outline oflight moving clockwise. inside of those was a myriad of different colors oflight all dancing about with no apparent pattern. then the object decided tomove drastically. it instantly darted closer to us high above the lake andstayed there for a couple of minutes. then it went directly above us around thesame altitude. the speed of it was incredible. it was in view for about 30minutes total. when it decided to leave it simply went. just a flash of lighttoward the east. when i say flash i mean flash. we all thought the obvious-thatit was something not man made. how else could it have moved like that witnessnumber 2 owns the home there still does and weve not seen anything like thisbefore or since. its been 12 years since this happened but in my mind its stillas clear as it was at the time of the incident.
I.. would like to mail my short story to you ..........What is your mailingaddress...............

I was outside in my back yard letting my dog back in. i looked up to see themoon. it was about 930 and the sky was dark with a quarter moon lit up. when ifist saw the object i thought it was somthing drifting off the trees..But thennoticed it was high in the sky. i stood transfixed watching these two craftglide softly by in the air.Two objects in the sky were spaced evenly apart. both were triangle in shape.Each triangle craft looked like there 3 balls all attached together to from asingle craft in the shape of a triangle. each craft  was luminus like you couldsee through them but you  couldnt. both passed directly under the moon making iteasy to see that they were not weather balloons. there was no sound as theypassed. no flashing lights could be seen and they both had a very softsilverblue glow as they glided along. during this time there was and  aircraftcould be seen off to the right of them...You could see its flashing lights as itseemed to at first be moving in the same direction then went vered off to the myright from the ground. moving quickly from the back yard through the house,grabing husband and son...The only thing left in the sky to see what the plane.Both craft had vanished.

Between 8 and 9 pm just after a severe thunderstorm passed over the calera noaa radar station i was loading 50 ton trucks at the chemlime plant in calera alabama.  i just looked up to check on the weather and noticed a bright red to orange colored star light, very high up, but thought it was going into birmingham airport.  then noticed 4 strobe light objects chasing it in a perfectly straight line toward birmingham.  i thought that they were military fighters chasing this bright star like object but they did not catch it as i could tell as the bright star like object went behind the high clouds north of me well over the city of birmingham.  i did not hear a sonic boom or see a vapor trail as it was night and you could of seen a trail if it had one, with lightning to the east.  it gave me an eerie feeling just watching it for the 20 to 30 seconds that i observed it, then told my supervisor about it and he got out of his pick up and looked up toward birmingham and saw the light as it went behind the high clouds.  i had my digital camera with me , but it did not dawn on me to take the pictures as it was astonishing to watch.  i brought my camera to work to take pictures of the bad weather and try to catch one of the tornadoes that we were having the last three days and nights.
content.summary: Large orange object followed by four small strobe

content.detailedDescription: Liberty, kentucky200am, one mile from home-two of us are in a carmobile.We see two bright lightstree top levelwest1000-1500away-moving northward were moving southward. westop, it stops. the object then changes direction eastward towards us. we knewescapewould be impossible so we waited as this object slowly, gently floated towardus. abreathtaking exp-combined with fear extreme excitment-and an forgien sensationasthis object came directly over our car. as previous discribed many small lightshad appeared in unision with the two brighter white lights. there was a very lowfluttering sound almost silentcoming from the craft-a lot like a bic lighter.Note: i was in the us navy at this time-and-this was no earthly craft, espicallyso with the light colors discribed. we dont remember how the craft left-amystery till this day. also, two months prior to this exp, one of the mostfamous abduction cases ever happened within 25 miles ofour location. see stanford,ky hwy 78 abduction of mona stafford and twoothers-either jan 6th or 9th of 1976. there is a connection with ours and hers.Also,in the months afterwards-i experienced migrane headaches for the first timein my life, nightmares, and strange skin rashes. today, none of these hardlybother me. im certain something happened that night. im willing to behypmotized to find out. reply at your conveince, thanks. also we never thoughtto check for a time loss that night.  kind reguards, greg cundiff  e-mailsafari_roadhouse@hotmail.Com

I saw one  or two  ufos from my house in port saint lucie in 1999...I think thatwas the year. it was on an early april evening as two bright lights appeared inthe sky to the east. one of my childs friends pointed them out to me...I thoughtthey were spot lights from 2 police helicopters at first, but they didnt move,they remained stationary. i called for my wife, who was in the kitchen, to comeand see. but before she could get out to the street, the lights had folded inupon themselves in a shroud of mist or cloud like matter and disappeared. itslike the lights slowly went out...First one, and then the other. like a doorslowly closing on a brightly lit room. later that evening it was reported on alocal news station by the meteoroligist that two strange lights had been seen inthe eastern sky simultaneously by many witnesses from vero beach to boca raton.Therefore whatever it...Or they were, both must have been tremendously largeobjects. he went on to say that no rocketlaunches had been made from the kennedyspace center that day. i never heard another word about this incident from themedia...And have concluded that they were indeed ufos. if anyone could offer alegitimate explanation, like the local news station that reported it  channel 25 i would be very grateful.

on a friday night on labor day weekend, my friend and i decided to visit my summer trailer and upon ariving at the location, we decided to grab a couple of beers and take a walk down to our dock on the mississippi river.  while enjoying the evening and discussing what we were going to do that night, my friend got my attention and pointed to a red glowing object that was hovering above the river.  i began to rationalize and looked upstream and recognized the radio tower in savanna,  and tried to justify what i was seeing,,,the radio tower was a couple of miles away and tiny at best compared to the object we were fixated on.  i started realizing that i wasnt sure of what i was witnessing,,and began telling my friend that no radio tower or bright light like we were seeing is natural to the area...The large object hovered silently in the air while i told my friend that the area that light was above was a man made island that was made when the river channels were widened..This man made island is about quarter to a half mile from our dock, and is so overgrown that no one except duck hunters will venture on the outskirts of the island.  after rationalizing that this light wasnt a helicopter, wasnt the moon, and wasnt the light that acompanies barges and riverboats, the object began to rise about 100 to 200 feet no noise, just a steady glow...After a minute,,the object lowered behind or below the islands treeline, when it lowered beyond sight,,the glow in and around the area was completly gone, like a light bulb had shut of.  my friend and i had the impression that what ever the object was,, was probably still there, but with its light turned off..It was to dark, and we werent about to chase it at night, and decided to go back in the morning to see whats back ther absolutly nothing but overgrown trees,,and lilly pads when we took our waverunners behind the island on the way to the main channel no place to land except a patch off water behind the island.  after the sighting my friend and i walked up to our trailer and got ready to go out that evening.  i told my dad what we had seen,,and was ready to tell others about my story.  my friend and i went out and came back around 130a.M.,not really thinking about the ufo incident, and ready to have fun at the beach in the morning.Upon falling asleep that i night,, i was awaken by my dad who was in my smallsingle bedroom in my trailer.  he was calming me down..All that i remember wasthat i was screaming get them off me while i was sleepwalking on my bed, rippingposters down and banging on the wall...In a tr

My name is bilal. my parents visited our home land pakistan back in 1999 and tobring the experience back to me in the states they video taped almost everythingincluding to my surprise, me being an avid ufo fan, a footage of an unidentifiedflying object. the ufo was unlike any i had ever seen on tv and i was not toosure if it was a ufo at all but after viewing the video a couple of times i wasconvinced that what i was looking at was not something you commonly see inpakistani sky92s or any sky in the world for that matter.The footage is not very long i believe its like 6 to 7 minutes the most. my dadtook the footage in a hurry becuase they my parents were about to go shoppingand my mother was getting impatient. its taken in the evening and taped on avideo camera. it shows a bright object in the sky over the roof of our house youcan see the roof of the house the light in the shed of our garage and a creepernext to the shed. then the camera zooms in to capture a bright white object witha ring of different hues changing quite rapidly, i am not sure if its because ofthe distance of the object or changes in the atmosphere but the most interestingthing i noticed as the camera is zooming in you can see a smaller orb flashingas it leaves the object to the right of the screen. you can hear my dad say thatthe object is unusually bright and that it92s going in and out on its own and that he sees some lights around it. then ashe zooms out again you can see the same smaller flashing orb make its way backtowards the bigger orb. the ufo goes in and out a couple of times going from abright point to a burst of fuzzy light like in the christoffer walther footage,even the markings are similar with a nucleus center and a brighter outer ring,like a bright chandelier. one other thing that i noticed in my dads footage isthat the object seems to have a flat base at certain times like its not aperfect sphere and it does not seem to be grain in the footage but quite adeliberate shape change.  at one point my dad leaves the house to goes out inthe street and you can hear neighborhood children in the back ground obliviousof the bright light in the sky because in pakistan there is too much chaos onthe ground then for people to be concerned with objects in the sky unless

My wife and i were walking down the street from our church to our home.  when wereached our next-door neighbors house i noticed three reddish-orange lights inthe sky.  it was a clear night and i could see stars and these lights werereally out-of-place.  when i first noticed them i asked my wife if she saw themand if she knew what they might be.  i asked her because i immediately thoughtthat they were ufos.  i thought it was kind of cool because i never had seenanything like it before.  i wasnt thinking aliens i was just thinking ufos.  icould better show you the pattern that they were in on paper or if we wereface-to-face, but its kind of hard to explain.  finally they turned and headedover the ocean or they were already over the ocean and headed towards directocean.  i had called my wifes parents and my youngest brother out to see it andthey all confirmed what my wife and i saw.  they finally kept going until theywent out of sight.  they never seemed to change altitude.  just direction. finally my wife called the police to report them and to see if they had anyinfo.  they said that they had recieved multiple reports regarding the lightsand that they were going to send a helicopter to see what they were, but theynever did.  when my wife called back around 1100p.M or so they said that theywere waiting for a call requiring the helicopter instead of just sending it outjust for the lights.  the sight happened originally around 730p.M.

I was taking the garbage up to the road when i saw the first one then the other two at different intervals.  i noticed these objects by the blinking white lights and red light on back of objects.  the front of these objects are completely black.  two were flying east.  the first passed over me and continued east, before i saw the second flying east not in the same flight line.  the third black triangle i saw flying north by northeast. i saw this third black triangle in the western sky, not far from the object that i described in the previous report.  although i did not see the front, as they have the same speed, size, same back end with the same lights, flying at the same speed as the black triangles that i reported last summer, i insist that these recent sightings are also black triangles.

I was at home, when i saw the object which i noticed first for its bright lights.  i first thought that the object might be a star.  but i noticed that the object would move around ever so little.  the object also had lights that would turn on and off.  i went inside after i had finished my activity outside.
content.summary: One hovering object, sparkling lights, which penny

content.detailedDescription: When first observed at 1105 a.M. i had finished a conversation on my cell phoneat the parking lot of the chesterland mcdonalds. i looked up to the north andsaw something moving like a hawk or vulture sbout a thousand feet high.As i watched the object i noticed mannerisms of a vehicle not a bird.I grabbed the binoculars in the car and clearly saw a disk slowly moving to thenortheast of my location.  i then called my friend who lived nearby and had himlook in the direction that i was looking in.He observed the same thing along with the other witness at the same location.The object was moving to the southeast and comming toward their location.Meanwhile i drve north on rt306 about a half mile closer and again observed thedisk still moving slowly and revolving around its axis and doing a u shapedipping from side to side. with the binoculars the object was filling the lensand i clearly saw the shape and light on the underside and the slightly domedtop from both locations that i was at. about 15 minutes have elapsed now and idrve to my friends house due to direction of the craft headind closer to him.When i arrived, about a half mile, i was able to see the object to my left theentire time they were on the porch following the object with binoculars.The object moved slowly to the east gaining altitude and moving away from usover the trees. it never stoped fluttering and moving in the u shape alsosometimes moving in an upside down rotaion. the craft seemed at times todisapear compleatly and reaaper in the same spot doing the same fluttering.Finnaly it moved eastward out of site because of the trees.
content.summary: Silvery disk in a slow dipping and tilting motion

content.detailedDescription: i was in my back yard at 9423 nagil ave in the san fernando valley north los   angeles when i felt somthing hot behind me. i turned around and saw an object   in the sky slowly rising at a steep angle towards the sun, which was a little   to the left. the object left a trail of heat behind it as it moved. it rose   passed the sun on the left side, almost tuching it, then it turned on end and   passed over the sun, then turned down and fell at a steep angle towards the   right until it passed behind a telephone pole at the right corner of the yard   at a hight just slightly above the wall.When i told my mother that i saw something in the sky, she told me to shut up,everything in the sky is associated with religion. you will get the whole familyin trouble if the authorities find out
